comments.comment: OMG, this game is awesome! I've never played something so good like this before. Graphics r amazing and the story, wow! I was literally on the edge of my seat the whole time. Definitly recommend!!!
This game is lit! The gameplay mechanics are sick, and the graphics are like next level. I can't stop playing it. Devs did a great job, keep it up!

I kinda liked the game, but there's lots of bugs. Like seriously, I was stuck in a wall LOL. Also, the story was confusing, had no idea what was going on. But hey, it's alright for killing time I guess.
Back in my day, games were simpler. Now, everything's so complicated. But this game, it reminds me of the good ol' days. Nostalgia hit me hard. Controls are a bit wonky, but I'm enjoying it!

I'm new to gaming, and this was my first game. It was overwhelming at first, but I'm getting the hang of it. The community is really nice and helps me when I'm stuck. Thumbs up for the friendly players!
